lead_paragraph: The Giles brothers reunion with their hometown San Diego Padres lasted only one season. Second baseman Marcus Giles, the younger brother of right fielder Brian Giles, was put on waivers yesterday. He hit .229 with 4 home runs and 39 runs batted in.
